con:testCase.name: V2 TestCase
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [V2] located at [/v2/pet]

con:config.script:
import java.io.* import jxl.* import jxl.write.* import java.text.SimpleDateFormat import groovy.json.JsonSlurper //GET log.info("=======================test started to read data from Excel=======================")
def file=new File("C:/Users/NIVEDITAMISRA/Desktop/Selenium/API Testing/RestProjectData.xls"); //97-2013 workbook xls workBook= Workbook.getWorkbook(file) def workSheet=workBook.getSheet(0) rows=workSheet.getRows() //max row number log.info "Total row number - "+rows
for(def i=0;i<rows;i++) {
String a=workSheet.getCell(0,i).getContents() testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("username",a)
String b=workSheet.getCell(1,i).getContents() testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("password",b)
String c=workSheet.getCell(2,i).getContents() testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("fname",c)
String d=workSheet.getCell(3,i).getContents() testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("lname",d)
String e=workSheet.getCell(4,i).getContents() testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("email",e)
String f=workSheet.getCell(5,i).getContents() testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("phone",f)
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.testSuites["Assignment2"].testCases["TC_011"].testSteps["Create_User"].run(testRunner,context)
def responseContent = context.testCase.getTestStepByName("Create_User").getPropertyValue("response") slurperResponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) log.info slurperResponse.message
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.testSuites["Assignment2"].testCases["TC_011"].testSteps["Get_user"].run(testRunner,context)
def responseContentforGetuser = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Get_user").getPropertyValue("response") slurperResponseget = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContentforGetuser) log.info slurperResponseget.username
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.testSuites["Assignment2"].testCases["TC_011"].testSteps["Modify_User"].run(testRunner,context)
def responseContentforGet = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Modify_User").getPropertyValue("response") GetResponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContentforGet) log.info GetResponse.message
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.testSuites["Assignment2"].testCases["TC_011"].testSteps["login_User"].run(testRunner,context)
def responseContentforlogin = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("login_User").getPropertyValue("response") GetloginResponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContentforlogin) log.info GetloginResponse.message
}

import java.io.* import jxl.* import jxl.write.* import java.text.SimpleDateFormat import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def file=new File("C:/Users/NIVEDITAMISRA/Desktop/Selenium/API Testing/TC_007.xls"); //97-2013 workbook xls workBook= Workbook.getWorkbook(file) def workSheet=workBook.getSheet(0) rows=workSheet.getRows() //max row number log.info "Total row number - "+rows
for(def i=0;i<rows;i++) {
String ws=workSheet.getCell(0,i).getContents() testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("name",ws) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.testSuites["Assignment2"].testCases["TC_007"].testSteps["Create_Pet"].run(testRunner,context)
def responseContent = context.testCase.getTestStepByName("Create_Pet").getPropertyValue("response") slurperResponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) log.info " Pet Name is : "+slurperResponse.name log.info " Pet id is : "+slurperResponse.id log.info " Pet availabily status is : "+slurperResponse.status
String id = slurperResponse.id testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("id",id)
String name=workSheet.getCell(1,i).getContents() testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("modifiedname",name)
String statusupd=workSheet.getCell(2,i).getContents() testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("status",statusupd)
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.testSuites["Assignment2"].testCases["TC_007"].testSteps["Modify_Pet"].run(testRunner,context)
def updateresponse = context.testCase.getTestStepByName("Modify_Pet").getPropertyValue("response") slurperUpdResponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(updateresponse) log.info " Modify Pet status code : "+slurperUpdResponse.code
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.testSuites["Assignment2"].testCases["TC_007"].testSteps["Get_Pet"].run(testRunner,context)
def responseforgetPet = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Get_Pet").getPropertyValue("response") getResponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseforgetPet) log.info " Pet name modified as :"+getResponse.name log.info " Pet Status modified as :"+getResponse.status
}
